item.title: AGI is a pipe dream until we solve one big problem, AI experts say, even as Google celebrates Gemini's success
item.description: At NeurIPS 2025, leading experts warned that scaling up language models won’t bring AGI any closer without a radical overhaul of how AI learns and reasons.

item.title: NVIDIA “Finally” Gets Approval to Sell Hopper H200 AI Chips to China, But Jensen Has Already Said Beijing Won’t Be Interested
item.description:
NVIDIA now has the 'green light' to sell Hopper H200 AI chips to China, a much more capable solution than the H20, but it appears that there are several caveats to this development. NVIDIA Re-Enters China, But With an AI Chip That Doesn't Hold Much Prospect For Adoption The situation for NVIDIA's position in China had become so dire that CEO Jensen Huang announced previously that the firm had 'zeroed' its market presence, attributing it to US export controls. NVIDIA's CEO has consistently opposed restricting the flow of American technology, instead building a narrative that emphasizes the importance of NVIDIA […]

Read full article at https://wccftech.com/nvidia-gets-approval-to-sell-h200-ai-chips-to-china-but-jensen-has-already-said-beijing-wont-be-interested/

item.title: America’s Biggest Bitcoin Miners Are Pivoting to AI
item.description: In the face of a profitability crisis, industrial-scale bitcoin miners are transforming their data centers into AI factories.
